subject: Parenting
title: Growing Pains Are Real
description: One-minute skill: Growing Pains Are Real.

hook.text: A six-year-old wakes up crying that her legs hurt. X-rays show nothing wrong.

buildup.text: Growing pains affect up to 40% of children, usually between ages three and twelve.

twist.text: Despite the name, they probably aren't caused by growth. The real cause remains unknown.

climax.text: Leading theories point to muscle fatigue or lower pain thresholds at night.
